articles.description: Katie Boulter and Sonay Kartal both produces impressive victories at either end of a record-breaking day for British players at Wimbledon.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Katie Boulter and Sonay Kartal open with wins

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats as Inter Milan take on Fluminese in the last 16 of the Club World Cup.
articles.title: FIFA Club World Cup LIVE: Inter Milan vs Fluminense - score & live text commentary

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz avoids a seismic shock against Italian veteran Fabio Fognini to set up a Wimbledon second-round meeting with British qualifier Oliver Tarvet.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Carlos Alcaraz beats Fabio Fognini to set up Oliver Tarvet match

articles.description: Extreme weather during the Club World Cup in the United States this summer means Fifa should think about playing the men's World Cup final at 9am next year, according to an expert.
articles.title: World Cup heat: Fifa should cosider 9am start for final, says expert

articles.description: World number 33 Yulia Putintseva raises security concerns about a spectator during her first-round match at Wimbledon, asking for them to be ejected.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Yulia Putintseva appeals to umpire over safety concern

articles.description: Brentford director of football Phil Giles says the club will only sell Bryan Mbeumo if the "deal is right" - and they have not ruled out the forward staying.
articles.title: Bryan Mbeumo might stay at Brentford amidst Man City interest say club

articles.description: Josh Tongue's ability to blow away the tail could be more significant for England than anyone realises, writes Steven Finn.
articles.title: England vs India: Josh Tongue's ability bowling to the tail crucial for Ben Stokes' side

articles.description: British number one Emma Raducanu cruises to a comfortable victory over compatriot Mimi Xu in her opening-round match at Wimbledon.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Emma Raducanu beats compatriot Mimi Xu in opening round

articles.description: Some players have said the calls are too quiet. Others say they miss the tradition. How has the first day of electronic line-calling gone at Wimbledon?
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: How has the first day of electronic line-calling gone?

articles.description: Fluminense goalkeeper Fabio has helped his side into the Club World Cup quarter-final as he eyes Peter Shilton's appearance world record.
articles.title: Fabio: The Fluminense history maker with his eyes on Peter Shilton
